Name: Through the Sea Thou Break
QuestDesc: Shorekeeper might have some clues about Abby's weakening frequencies. Return to the Black Shores to find out.

Unlock.Name: The Sacred Breeze So Often Breathes

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's been some time... Have you been well?

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm calling because I have news about Abby's situation.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When you have a moment, could you return to the Black Shores? I'll be here whenever you're ready to visit.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're back.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Black Shores welcomes your return.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I am expressing myself through music... just like you taught me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I asked you here to talk about Abby. Have you noticed an increase in its hunger or fatigue lately?

Options.PlotLineKey: Yes, it's been more noticeable lately.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then my suspicion was correct.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The unusual frequency I noticed is from Abby. The change is subtle, but it's getting stronger.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Its frequency... is weakening.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Abby was worried about how this might affect you and has been asking for my help.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...The one I'm trying to protect might be facing danger because of me. I can sense how anxious Abby is.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've looked into the most viable solution for Abby's weakening frequency.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Before I explain, you should see a past record stored in Tethys. It's important for you to see it yourself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It may answer some questions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please, hold my hand.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You receive a message from Shorekeeper about a possible solution to Abby's weakening frequency. Before going into more detail, Shorekeeper insists that you first visit the Black Shores to review a past record stored within the Tethys System...

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I found this when searching for information about Abby.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It remained hidden until the core leak in the Tethys System was finally resolved.

Options.PlotLineKey: It's no coincidence you're finding it now.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (That message... I think I should trust it.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Imperator is Rinascita's Sentinel.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It is also the solution Tethys proposes. As Rinascita's Sentinel, Imperator should have the knowledge to fix Abby's weakening frequency.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rinascita, also called the Land of Echoes, is renowned for its Echo technologies. It's home to many like Abby who have physical forms.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Rinascita? I may finally learn who Abby really is...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It just so happens that the best time to visit Rinascita is now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please take this with you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mysterious Invitation with a Fragrance
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To our esteemed business partner,

Dialogues.Speaker: Mysterious Invitation with a Fragrance
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As the celebrated Carnevale returns to Rinascita, the Montelli family, proud organizers of this grand festival, extend an invitation for you to grace Ragunna with your esteemed presence and partake in the celebrations.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mysterious Invitation with a Fragrance
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the spirit of goodwill, we have arranged a modest sum for your use during your stay in Rinascita. These funds are available at your convenience at the Averardo Bank.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mysterious Invitation with a Fragrance
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Montelli family holds in high regard each of its many friendships. Should you choose to place the Blake Bloom upon the Golden Scale, we shall consider you our most honored guest and a lifelong friend of the family.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mysterious Invitation with a Fragrance
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Montelli family eagerly awaits your arrival.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Montellis are one of the leading families in Ragunna, a city-state within Rinascita. Their trade connections with the Black Shores prompted this invitation.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It is Rinascita's grandest festival. During this time, Ragunna's port relaxes its regulations to welcome visitors.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "A majestic tribute to our Sentinel!"

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "Food, wine, light shows, and a masquerade ball, topped with extraordinary Echo performances!"

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: "All are welcome, no matter your wealth or rank! Celebrate with us and let the joy and merriment never end!"

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. It's also an excellent travel destination.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However... Rinascita is particularly special to the Black Shores.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Threnodian's revival in Jinzhou has triggered similar reactions in other countries, with Rinascita as the one exception. We've detected no frequency fluctuations related to Threnodians there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: While many of our Bloom Bearers have visited Rinascita city-states before, our presence is often met with a hint of skepticism.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Given the circumstances, the best approach would be to visit as a guest of a prominent family.

Options.PlotLineKey: How can we get to Rinascita?

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you leaving now?

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please wait... I'll open a portal for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Opening a portal will drain your computing power. I think it's better served for Black Shores operations.

Options.PlotLineKey: You needn't worry about this small matter.
It would be better to keep a low profile.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...I see.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll have Aalto arrange your transportation to Rinascita then.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
Shorekeeper explains that "Imperator" is the name of the Sentinel of Rinascita, who might hold the solution to Abby's weakening frequency.
Rinascita, known as the Land of Echoes, is famed for its advanced Echo technologies and is home to many Echoes like Abby. This region may also hold vital clues as to Abby's origins.
Shorekeeper gives you an invitation letter from the Montelli family, which allows you to enter Rinascita through the port city of Ragunna.
Even as the Threnodian's revival spreads chaos across other regions, Rinascita remains strangely unaffected and is gearing up to celebrate the Carnevale grand festival. This unusual calm belies what could be a rough journey.

Options.PlotLineKey: This will be another long trip.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Safe journey.

Dialogues.Speaker: Shorekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll be here guarding the Black Shores until you return.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Money
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ku! The market's down.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Money
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Should I buy in, or sell out?

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Money
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course, I am. Every Shell Credit I use is maximized for the entire Black Shores!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Money
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Several Rinascita companies were acquired in after-hours trading by the New Federation.  Now they're begging me to play the white knight.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Money
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nonsense! I'm making money for the Black Shores, all within the law. I haven't done anything that goes against our principles!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Money
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Listen, money is power in this world. It's what lets you do anything you want—even save the world.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Money
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ku… The market's closed.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Money
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: At night, the sound of Shell Credits flowing in and out fades away.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Money
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What! Oh, it's you.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Money
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, alright, I get it. But it looks like you’ve still got plenty. If you run short, you know where to find me.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Money
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ku ku ku… Welcome to the Black Shores!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Money
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ku, I hope to see you soon!

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There you are! I've got your ship readied!

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You'll have to sail to Rinascita, but the Threnodian ruckuses everywhere have left you with only the dinghies.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry, behold my private stash. Remarkably fit for keeping a low profile, if I may say so myself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, aren't you eagle-eyed!

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Tiny but mighty. It's got all the essentials.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, stuck on "bigger is better," are we? Haven't you heard "less is more"?

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is cutting-edge gear from the New Fed World Expo. Nearly lost my shirt haggling for it. Planning to stock up for the Black Shores.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Word is, Ragunnesi treat the Sentinel like a god—churches and all. Real holy rollers. When in Ragunna, do as the Ragunnesi do, ok?

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, let me work my magic on the autopilot. Before you know it, you'll be cruising into Ragunna.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just give me a holler when you're ready to go.

Options.PlotLineKey: I still need to pack up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then off we go. Our destination is—

Options.PlotLineKey: This better be a safe journey...

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hold onto your britches! We're about to go from zero to light speed!

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You got it, chief. I'll hold the fort.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
Aalto has prepared your ship on the Black Shores. Before you set sail, he advises you to be mindful of Ragunna's customs—its people worship their Sentinel as a god.
When you are ready, you may embark on your voyage to Ragunna.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So, are you ready now, captain?

Options.PlotLineKey: I still need to pack up.

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Then off we go. Our destination is—

Options.PlotLineKey: This better be a safe journey...

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hold onto your britches! We're about to go from zero to light speed!

Dialogues.Speaker: Aalto
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No problem. You can always find me here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeesh, this fog is giving me the creeps. I've got a bad feeling about this...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh… Wait, what's that huge shadow under the water?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's getting closer.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Watch out!
Ah, new allies born from the perils of the high seas! What better way to begin an epic story?
Merely my duty, dear friend. The mists thicken once more, shrouding this ever-tumultuous path. A maiden voyage for you, I presume?
These waters teem with colossal, mystical Tacet Discords. That behemoth you saw is called "Cetus the Tidebreaker."
It is a gentle giant that usually keeps to deep waters and exhibits no aggressive behavior...
I saw something odd on its hide. Could that be the cause of its madness?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That big fella smells of sadness and anger all over...
Well, well, who's this little beach ball? A talking Echo! Clever little thing! Got a name?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What? First off, I'm not little! And beach ball? Really? Also, spill your name before you go askin' mine!
Oh my, where are my manners? I do apologize.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Brant's the name, captain of this fine vessel. As you can tell, we are a troupe, a merry band of fools chasing freedom across the seas!

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please forgive the lack of propriety. Now, travelers from afar, may I know your names?

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm the watcher of the realm, master of both light and darkness.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Humph, hear that?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa, hold up! My name's Abby! This is {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Aw, c'mon, enough with the fancy talk!... My name's Abby, and this is {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, {PlayerName} and Abby! Splendid! "All who step aboard, guests of honor be! With names exchanged, friendship's born at sea!"

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahoy, crew! Let's give our new mates a proper welcome!

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Welcome to the one and only Troupe of Fools!

Dialogues.Speaker: Giant Mysterious Echo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *Cheerful sounds*

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are those… Echoes? Incredible! Never seen 'em like this before. Hmph, they're almost as special as me… like, 60, no, 70% as special! *Hiccup*

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Er...

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha ha ha, your little companion is quite amusing. I presume you must be headed to Rinascita for the Carnevale?

Options.PlotLineKey: Yes. We heard it's a big festival.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Indeed it is! The crown jewel of Rinascita's calendar. Ah, the endless masquerades, the sumptuous feasts, the wine flowing like rivers, and the music that never sleeps! For a few glorious nights, all your cares disappear!

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And at the Carnevale's peak, our Sentinel Imperator will crown the festival's finest performer with the "Laurel."

Options.PlotLineKey: Does the Laurel get you an audience with the Sentinel?

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha! Of course not. No mortal's ever laid eyes on the divine Sentinel up in the heaven of heavens. But the Laureate may hear the Sentinel's voice.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've got a real Laureate in our troupe. Shame he didn't sail with us today. Oh, the tales he would tell! You'd love to hear about his glory days.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chatting with the Sentinel if you get the Laurel? That's somethin'!

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you also attending the Carnevale?

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Absolutely! It's been a decade since the last Carnevale. We're not about to miss this one.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sentinel or Laurel, it matters not...

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Troupe of Fools shall forever breathe freedom and unbridled joy into that city.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Huh?

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's the fog.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fog? Ew, I don't like the smell coming from the sea now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Beware, my friends. The fog can affect Echoes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This isn't just bad weather. It's a Waveworn Phenomenon. Many Tacet Discords lurk in the fog, ready to obliterate any passing ship.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But fear not! Our vessel shall not perish here! Before you stands a seasoned captain!

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hark, brave crew! Secure the lines and unfurl the sails! The helm is mine to command!

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The final curtain shall not fall here! Our saga must endure!

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
Your smooth sailing meets a sudden disruption as you come under attack from Cetus the Tidebreaker. Just when things seemed most dire, Brant, the leader of a traveling troupe, comes to your rescue and brings you aboard his liner.

Brant tells you he and his troupe will take part in the upcoming Carnevale, where the Sentinel Imperator will make a rare appearance to crown the festival's finest performer with the Laurel, an honor that grants the Laureate the privilege of hearing the Sentinel's voice.

As you converse, a Waveworn Phenomenon rises as a mist over Rinascita's seas. Hidden within are many TDs, ready to attack any passing ship. To survive this mist, you fight alongside the troupe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Giant Mysterious Echo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *Pained whimpering*

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Bear with me, Lario... We are nearly through this fog.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rage on, tempest! Your fury is but a breeze against our righteous course!

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Time to fight, my friends! I will hold the ship steady! Let the deluge descend, our vessel stands firm! Our clarion call shall pierce the tempest's roar!

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you for your aid, my friends!

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Onward to Ragunna we sail. Rest well as we journey forth.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Settle in and take a good look around! No need to be shy, you hear?

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You successfully fought your way through the mist, but Ragunna is still some distance away. Now is the time to get to know the troupe members who offer a glimpse into the vibrant culture that awaits in Ragunna.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange Box
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Zzz... Zzz...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shh, it's probably napping! But its frequency is way off from the other Echoes...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *Sniff* Nah, doesn't smell like an Echo to me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No way that's a supply chest! Its frequency is weird...

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This chest? It's our first mate's personal haven.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All good, Roccia? Some new friends have joined us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange Box
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, you see, she's rather reserved. Her way of being friendly… is an acquired taste.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This coin is one of her prized possessions. I'd wager it's her way of saying "Nice to meet you."

Dialogues.Speaker: Strange Box
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh huh...

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha... Maybe she's taken by your rapport with Abby.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A mysterious chest on the liner catches your eye. Brant explains that it is the personal haven of the liner's first mate, who seems timid around strangers. Yet, despite her shyness, she gathers the courage to offer you a rare antique coin as a gesture of goodwill.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The mysterious and giant Echo bellows a deep, resonating greeting.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello there!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's saying "hi" to us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lario
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *Confused sounds*

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …It's stumped about why fries don't get some seagulls…

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Quit with the wacky noises already!

Dialogues.Speaker: Lario
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *Cheerful sounds*

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It happily bobs its head, careful not to affect the ship's hull.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Main_Linaxita_2_0_9_11
Ho ho!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The enigmatic giant wraps you in a bear hug. A peculiar yet friendly energy washes over you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The giant Plushie wraps you in a bear hug. A peculiar yet friendly energy washes over you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Behold, my friends! There she stands… Ragunna's Lighthouse of Dawn!

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here we are! Ragunna's dock.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You'll find Echo boats ahead to ferry you straight into the heart of Ragunna.

Options.PlotLineKey: Are you not going into town?

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, the Carnevale hasn't started yet. We're just passing through, lending our friends a hand.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And a quiet arrival? That's not our style. We'll sail into Ragunna with flair—complete with a dazzling show and the loudest of ovations.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't forget to stash some confetti in your pockets for the occasion!

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My pleasure! Speaking of which, where's that charming little companion of yours?

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is it asleep? The fog likely caused this. Don't worry. Echoes will recover when they're out of it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, and do yourself a favor, try our Nectarwine. They say one drop of the "Gocce di Divino" will let you rendezvous with the Sentinel in your dreams...

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha! That might just be your shortcut to seeing the Sentinel.

Dialogues.Speaker: Brant
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: May the winds be in your favor!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... Wha... Huh? We docked already? Where is Brant and the crew?

Options.PlotLineKey: I tried waking you up just now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You did? I didn't hear a thing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whoa, this is Ragunna, huh? How do we get into town?

Options.PlotLineKey: Let's take a look around first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Order Deacon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Go forth, dear pilgrims, on your sacred journey. May the Sentinel guide you as it has guided the returning ships.

Dialogues.Speaker: Order Deacon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Go forth, Andreas... "The Fool." The benevolent Primus has blessed you with this sacred pilgrimage. May you find the righteous path on your voyage.

Dialogues.Speaker: Andreas
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you're all so righteous, why don't you join the pilgrimage yourselves!

Dialogues.Speaker: Order Deacon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our duty remains here, to shepherd the lost. I grieve for you, my brother... for you have strayed from the truth.

Dialogues.Speaker: Andreas
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha... Haha... Truth... Don't make me laugh...

Dialogues.Speaker: Order Deacon
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your transgression is absolved before the sacred Pilgrim's Sail. Go now, and board with humility.
Wait a moment, traveler... While you may harbor doubts, I implore you not to disrupt their pilgrimage.
Perhaps staying silent now would better serve your interests.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Pardon my intrusion. Allow me to introduce myself. I am Cristoforo, a modest playwright visiting Ragunna in search of inspiration for my latest work.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A pleasure to make your acquaintance. I'm working on a play—tales of pilgrims striving to reach the Sentinel's promised land...

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Word of a new Pilgrim's Sail about to depart brought me here. I came hoping to glean fresh ideas.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes. When Ragunnesi first settled here, they revered the Sentinel. The Carnevale was their tribute—a sacred rite to commune with it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It seemed the Sentinel Imperator preferred not to flaunt its power overtly to command the people's awe and respect.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yet, amidst the Carnevale's revelry, it performed miracles, keeping the people aligned with its guidance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Legend has it that, moved by its grace, the most devout believer braved storms and mists to find the Sentinel—thus was born the tradition of the Pilgrim's Sail.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Should you wish, I have more stories to tell.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
You finally arrive at the docks of Ragunna. The troupe bids you farewell, promising to make their grand entrance during the opening of the Carnevale.
As you and Abby search for a way into the city, you witness deacons from the Order sending "the Fools" on a pilgrimage. A mysterious playwright named Cristoforo notices your confusion and begins to explain the origins of this practice.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The liner continues to glide through the waves. Before long, distant coastlines emerge from the horizon.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gondolier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello there! Need a lift to the city? Hop on this Gondola right here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gondolier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Correct! In Ragunna, we sail in Echoes. They are trusted and reliable helpers, gifts from divinity.

Dialogues.Speaker: Gondolier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A third of a Ragunnesi's life is spent on a Gondola. Pretty amazing, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Gondolier
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This little one will get you there safe and sound.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
At the dock, you plan to ride the Echo boat "Gondola" into the city.
Maybe you'll see a whole flock of Echoes like Abby along the way!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A righteous soul with humble curiosity... Just as I expected.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Fenrico, the Enlightened One, present Primus of Ragunna, uncovered the path that leads to the high heaven, where the Sentinel imparts Their teachings to mortals.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Under his permission, pilgrims set sail for the Promised Land, their voices a symphony of hymns, hearts aflame with unwavering piety and hope.

Options.PlotLineKey: That... doesn't seem like what I just saw.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I sense your doubt, and it's not unfounded. These pilgrims have little choice. After all, they are not counted among the Righteous but instead deemed the Fools by Ragunna's laws.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whether a righteous soul clinging to hope amid hardship, or a lost fool floundering in waves of confusion, the audience always favors the former.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm working on a play. Tells of pilgrims striving to reach the Sentinel's promised land.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But to captivate, there must be twists. Perhaps, what awaits them is not the sweet salvation promised by their Sentinel, but...

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, who knows? Maybe treasures beyond count, or an unnamed beast lurking in the mist.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Or perhaps nothing but a forsaken shore. These are just initial musings. I need time to refine them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Would you care to share your thoughts on the ending?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Should the story depict them as lost Fools facing their end in despair, or as wronged Righteous finally finding justice and redemption?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What is more compelling to you, {Male=sir;Female=miss}?

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, I see... Your comment is noted.

Dialogues.Speaker: Cristoforo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Until the Carnevale, guest from afar. I hope you enjoy the show.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Cristoforo gives a courteous nod and takes his leave.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm honestly baffled... Was all that real or just a story?

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm, that one gives off a mysterious vibe...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, who cares? The Carnevale sounds like a blast! Everyone's raving about it. You might even catch a chat with the Sentinel!

Dialogues.Speaker: Cheerful Resident
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Seems like there's been a lot of mist lately, hm?

Dialogues.Speaker: Nervous Resident
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's not a good sign. The Carnevale is fast approaching...

Dialogues.Speaker: Cheerful Resident
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Eh, don't worry! We Ragunnesi do not worry over tomorrow. Why not get some flowers for the children? Prices may rise with the Carnevale approaching.

Dialogues.Speaker: Matteo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Andreas... That ship... No, no, I must stop that ship!

Dialogues.Speaker: Simone
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Have you gone mad? You can't stop the Pilgrim's Sail. The Order will arrest you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Matteo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, you just don't understand...

Chapters.Title: Travel to Ragunna on the liner

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I didn't know all the ships in Ragunna are Echoes. That troupe isn't as special as I thought...

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now I can't even imagine what kind of Echoes we might see in the city.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Maybe we'll come across some that look like you, a whole pack of them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're kidding me... Even in the Land of Echoes, I, Abby, will always be the most special one!

Dialogues.Speaker: Abby
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hic!

Dialogues.Speaker: Serious Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Approved. Welcome to Rinascita.

Dialogues.Speaker: Serious Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Excuse me. First-time visitors must cooperate for inspection.

Dialogues.Speaker: Serious Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is this... a Reserved Terminal?

Dialogues.Speaker: Serious Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Reserved Terminals should be declared upon entry. May I see your declaration form, please?

Dialogues.Speaker: Serious Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These are the rules. I'll need you to cooperate.

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Forgive the inconvenience. By the Order's decree, all visitors must undergo customs clearance to ensure safety...

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Or, do you have a guarantor?

Dialogues.Speaker: Serious Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, I see you are a guest of the Montelli family. You are granted permission to bring your Reserved Terminal into Rinascita.

Dialogues.Speaker: Serious Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We apologize for any trouble caused. All Echoes, even those in Reserved Terminals, are seen as Divine Envoys. Once they are baptized, they too will receive Imperator's blessings.

Options.PlotLineKey: Does that mean I can see the Sentinel in person?
I don't have any plans to do that.

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Naturally! We are all "united" under the Sentinel's influence, free from "division."

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Sentinel is with you, me—all of us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Their presence is eternal in our hearts, guiding us always...

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rest assured, for our Sentinel embodies peace, justice, modesty, and mercy. Laud Their name, and you will find solace!

Dialogues.Speaker: Senior Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Their presence is eternal in our hearts, guiding us always...
Preach with respect and patience, lest you induce doubt and confusion.

Dialogues.Speaker: Serious Acolyte
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Acolyte Phoebe.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll take it from here. Greetings, esteemed guest. I am Phoebe, an Acolyte of the Order.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The city of Ragunna welcomes your arrival. Many visitors are here for the upcoming Carnevale. To ensure everyone enjoys the festival safely, the Order has tightened the customs procedures and added new regulations...

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Some information might be overlooked on your declaration form. Please accept our apologies.

Options.PlotLineKey: Can we enter the city now?

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you for your understanding. Please follow me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Phoebe
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Certainly. Please follow me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Narrator
Dialogues.PlotLineKey:
Before entering the city, you go through The Order's customs checkpoint. It seems they have additional regulations for Reserved Terminals. Fortunately, the Montelli family has already arranged a guarantor for you.

During the inspection, the Order members' elusive words confuse you, until Acolyte Phoebe arrives to clear up your questions.

With her guidance, you finally step into the city of Echoes.
